Browsed web for a site advertising a high-value item auction.
Started to look into the site and noticed a search feature.
Tested the site for vulnerabilities with random queries into the search bar.
Set up Burp Suite and intercepted the request sent by the search feature.
Noticed that the query parameter was susceptible to SQL injection.
Crafted payloads to exploit the SQL injection vulnerability.
Used SQLMap to automate the exploitation and retrieve sensitive data.
Bypassed authentication and logged in as admin.
